This [StackOverflow answer](https://stackoverflow.com/a/50055326/6809280) helps getting started on this challenge.

To reconstruct the private key I'll need the following numbers

```
modulus = n
publicExponent = e
prime1 = p
prime2 = q
totient = phi = (p - 1) * (q - 1)
privateExponent = d, where d * e ≡ 1 (mod phi)
exponent1 = d mod (p-1)
exponent2 = d mod (q-1)
coefficient = c, where q * c ≡ 1 mod p
```

I can get `n` and `e` directly from the public cert

```bash
$ openssl rsa -pubin -in public.pem -text -noout
RSA Public-Key: (8208 bit)
Modulus: 00:a2:89:d3:f2:7f:cb:df:bc:e2:cd:ba:e6:53:ec:
6c:38:b9:11:cb:04:5b:e5:5a:75:02:22:a6:f4:e7:
c8:6c:2e:3e:29:d3:de:1b:4c:8f:59:7a:d8:d9:d2:
74:1d:6a:b3:b6:55:1d:14:cf:a9:34:fd:8c:35:22:
65:46:24:4a:88:f9:93:db:7d:42:2c:78:0a:a6:3b:
b9:8a:49:a8:8e:17:55:a6:3c:95:86:34:29:46:18:
e1:65:9c:85:60:f4:b6:05:24:0d:fd:9a:6b:76:d1:
ef:f1:da:92:a9:33:ba:b3:b8:2f:22:68:5a:57:a1:
7e:ba:22:58:12:8e:3a:02:0b:e9:c6:51:04:d0:d6:
45:41:81:c9:8b:c6:ee:a4:fa:7b:39:08:25:8e:8a:
5a:d8:a6:ef:65:51:18:fa:08:77:24:02:d0:ac:ce:

4e:0b:cf:f1:e7:5a:67:8c:cf:d4:3f:5a:c0:f5:d1:

91:34:c7:81:da:79:ba:23:cb:34:1e:74:07:dd:30:
e5:e5:84:45:a3:35:8d
Exponent: 65537 (0x10001)
```

I can use a multitude of online tools to get that as a decimal, but easiest might be to use [CyberChef](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Hex('Auto')To_Hex('None',0)From_Base(16)&). That gives

```
n = 453858 422260 876570 907339 490258 404539 784069 277370 491319 460940 023781 075569 102822 511843 379481 031916 160218 185348 786184 126501 885244 697443 702482 044699 767227 875085 626460 486878 101182 473832 712732 518322 690039 112994 383507 423505 972002 087887 980197 977837 555144 102740 803486 252563 770863 525983 813904 574800 123836 110353 173038 597817 284510 343199 957710 314717 211205 621490 778462 098988 789558 875983 553399 494230 439858 858607 143595 829855 422127 073661 214110 042961 768834 163709 111129 489867 884680 970951 735704 337592 151666 081464 153677 270173 804326 948755 529641 072183 221692 134783 797753 001668 957219 735232 280360 849560 878498 873105 458945 526630 027588 139844 158674 086531 842893 147599 263254 639163 299282 064436 541802 891469 425505 528985 823329 937136 518056 014181 915701 895871 044016 573630 858806 691629 613040 593027 906478 876395 672621 796776 856623 687524 362454 939918 769779 593317 914048 425752 366787 839522 847797 273848 460779 799472 497407 307451 289809 503924 633224 979342 726743 810586 835454 867269 780028 515317 351481 481799 250486 964640 490262 930162 605791 206891 775969 082380 795257 320718 884957 415253 856254 931498 256323 171232 206971 281053 360954 985613 343692 526232 949457 347871 146156 857913 355000 815675 132217 671489 989427 597597 927918 904648 687820 197379 129851 819429 525774 877476 990620 046850 251953 009131 437054 514663 372818 656328 932544 117362 444500 987633 816605 694638 234607 859559 906823 200948 404167 233818 414153 622344 825098 795500 374133 083967 243289 889730 817969 193943 463352 016149 828655 108033 964814 113648 130278 323420 515647 268118 370373 335712 162012 970544 379031 429612 819978 802488 638822 998501 897583 017541 115216 723919 341947 381779 786168 887779 815439 099061 051410 284776 410213 026808 302613 600411 867353 339191 751612 971017 023020 026087 588402 917731 233864 030301 925197 164398 380533 637430 460864 450305 637472 191982 762846 899048 602788 698624 942378 714686 109219 497463 672069 025788 995875 878460 030528 979077 819990 910125 068561 42221
e = 65537
```

Now we need to factor `n` into `p` and `q`... I try an [online factorization tool](https://www.alpertron.com.ar/ECM.HTM) (could also use [FactorDB](http://factordb.com/index.php)) and cross my fingers..... bingo! Even though the key is huge (8208 bits, hence the challenge name), its weak because one of the primes used is very small.

```
p = 53549
q = 847557 232181 509591 042483 501575 014547 020615 282022 990755 123232 971261 976076 309216 814213 859233 658735 289581 850919 319098 632097 490606 169011 003906 785747 198319 063074 243142 704584 775033 098344 904167 245555 827446 101690 757077 486985 699083 246910 269469 043002 773430 134532 490777 143483 110540 861610 513556 882108 207130 124471 368351 599128 432856 529907 108835 486595 849045 960691 662705 370760 965767 569858 547124 118527 778032 939190 542486 003203 462486 831987 925283 465539 541044 956412 091970 886231 086819 494204 813730 111845 509096 493798 490498 926541 680193 745458 420588 754567 259317 886018 035356 405663 891426 049472 969356 756542 378940 546238 882043 598629 344316 681626 470473 933279 506420 563594 583007 412208 069771 731379 749020 320583 812032 958572 192440 451057 009572 567521 178176 802313 850896 512784 288794 733103 537023 274062 833066 679855 221613 469489 358575 673727 543847 578701 319874 494982 005356 637383 269132 643976 260616 022425 182131 878228 346761 484717 342638 525321 916795 793278 542538 255778 512119 492931 296622 747982 878263 799135 839113 642907 412394 125310 660873 605280 726006 241724 019603 205883 179949 947436 415906 684897 183275 658930 044043 074854 381484 401955 717833 992038 804056 880145 850518 143666 769103 128548 265451 501114 605533 071279 717624 459915 026829 987344 775599 129107 705013 007252 901557 324129 780804 816583 329233 563751 631132 207162 306845 181484 153686 059256 281455 971004 790006 938831 971124 897738 500116 897790 673810 724100 707427 211300 173395 991391 046829 636525 123315 901190 411672 852142 600644 268152 821323 132858 523675 342574 928452 589874 804034 028708 540207 744316 095561 688591 768843 442057 574593 053466 908225 464951 882982 882583 695517 772806 817904 151360 376184 628871 594158 647520 622022 459116 960244 118212 328559 558625 859699 412787 372493 849192 691941 044907 964829 663887 003774 716128 338061 368515 038479 060218 726353 204498 665932 224411 757368 035129 390006 376708 011015 436943 607806 153919 670770 672904 847159 974300 611790 807596 606515 903095 116934 459688 162530 807941 931873 229192 653706 108362 559295 236459 413076 026037 484098 218426 787096 959997 004586 621882 371055 679885 999537 101597 409999 608907 424943 079406 121981 186502 184135 352522 282451 432323 538957 267847 537122 502007 961474 331417 613716 771449 445091 441763 298390 461136 463452 377538 572668 627650 405511 341235 822094 410189 101594 746016 506436 029828 418791 765464 600315 595999 734043 619005 238597 777585 654162 321947 722961 937253 385570 410392 446936 982532 652734 928398 854532 485035 887417 765395 715350 372587 766382 240728 283260 037967 532286 373792 087988 878220 658711 903920 635052 849363 456781 997764 221268 182503 133183 997133 358939 876909 203196 133380 029634 588487 172264 427832 509531 418098 974753 795822 645729
```

On of the great things about python is it comes with arbitrary-precision integer math out of the box! This means we can simply use the python REPL to calculate the totient of `n`, denoted `phi(n)`, by pasting in the value of `p` and `q` and typing `(p - 1) * (q - 1)` , giving

```
phi = 45384 994668 855475 581142 906542 338878 963859 907121 767108 955338 879145 136294 934205 941967 523734 243957 957286 528953 027699 093551 556426 979138 201237 200563 190975 589189 499571 805545 105533 472350 172928 347665 023448 083853 336659 985273 110214 509705 551109 528314 712511 636843 945816 134479 233603 242057 519779 943923 130275 403905 192832 491430 129322 601463 465863 922636 234524 713103 117154 547193 508194 921830 785481 402298 925458 107827 775169 040499 539009 244879 289423 079012 711343 875325 954700 857015 902237 010275 679365 620029 103321 099049 921569 236518 453891 014681 807505 686629 567601 954160 493757 264810 490058 082097 178563 115599 331307 508369 999655 670619 404129 469667 734240 938179 251009 808339 362730 880908 917720 136671 922800 540126 621966 740865 623760 801273 200748 591845 624049 011410 302087 806466 573096 380368 228200 522279 516585 054572 887406 958064 216173 010176 762517 950144 298276 639457 296422 837218 599295 514819 640803 466768 823652 797815 371512 383983 644263 607753 938000 581138 479395 838520 427766 974607 485071 554908 987165 269916 125912 857350 406118 880622 135268 459815 572316 182231 837801 712468 632519 959785 325198 971162 874370 044984 385998 418572 302419 726755 924778 574605 693879 637818 050003 545557 068151 934327 502518 396981 684897 084900 886319 354579 529856 692162 338043 782165 459388 036512 378372 591592 501502 536318 404113 798871 772343 867429 127206 945778 113461 581101 055359 404335 364495 291560 574389 796024 101204 259642 895001 216654 144681 312310 701685 008547 007775 633376 647303 319876 944164 257886 531979 299271 047276 211118 308225 767244 202268 779282 616006 414169 284911 044292 638285 137300 712038 028635 299004 308827 046001 657197 243429 967396 591727 585698 259485 131497 045423 934506 816124 007257 434268 058640 794987 152042 033769 707245 297535 184155 938222 300636 570268 059072 731700 698841 821278 128499 240246 510161 243280 476716 592358 761394 494563 338752 800783 543545 108576 061459 960573 854617 456310 803930 090530 427992 708755 722303 849160 174165 183085 713578 937321 606447 381727 199703 674567 947676 808220 654690 598325 141321 928651 395042 255198 491400 317595 468013 919601 604428 557205 289546 535503 212716 338110 659057 774790 852016 039019 848574 818956 079856 863180 709298 060864 083778 699917 835737 522321 027498 750379 305677 574885 756523 541102 212412 935344 947912 435489 259673 423914 321300 495801 511476 806012 195459 691886 636525 252169 461457 098417 699534 593758 567710 492516 433794 156609 084015 656669 165816 044290 524335 694748 581540 658488 649945 901862 505508 701699 446501 409765 581751 329714 236226 518112 008513 085418 870743 818727 628450 959832 705031 142165 809977 714383 762416 278520 468636 677775 736678 497104 512528 734012 746550 233826 872944 311100 415581 575220 388376 363900 116258 711033 442944
```

`d` and `c` require us to do a 'modular multiplicative inverse'. I used the `modinv` implementation from [this answer](https://crypto.stackexchange.com/a/54479), but in Python 3.8+ you can just do `d = pow(e, -1, phi)`

```
d = 509132 979546 554551 585459 586034 263756 568500 293207 244434 502115 506469 691991 327467 057303 865746 313653 206540 672997 939551 300473 080627 966834 086845 443857 027408 230039 826131 672746 106599 460943 392845 586513 347254 699619 651684 104746 793867 701230 162743 568014 657957 419589 986786 427043 235807 308248 600671 601878 105169 247159 585737 029455 591161 887116 287031 080491 319751 729151 650701 483080 812745 571661 709964 248747 577655 383599 803229 909444 452440 557780 392508 776571 179334 072960 951768 773030 369480 598054 220815 781091 547700 871591 655670 883445 493395 700048 291471 700109 222285 986523 566997 895672 250647 755586 091514 756376 220719 290685 013760 914283 319590 248252 410301 627315 643718 984559 859007 028765 984220 279860 195659 812031 256693 896339 572896 853625 542676 117687 761124 756837 421532 192718 991416 434177 966233 180949 701593 483406 119010 567600 160678 656056 209518 240781 361566 524696 039337 624900 654623 533201 091272 239627 067908 768388 256037 119562 617492 476321 699467 892228 970685 574259 097826 872322 856166 854892 463248 339752 136520 327815 105644 155719 575955 134601 961744 620242 720170 575506 029093 099076 416166 190074 999417 993996 072234 574886 808047 104856 125504 799580 483395 787476 240331 517975 441434 641768 464402 176799 895270 409373 813601 316613 063622 687607 777740 644949 352916 435660 780620 555393 245108 331191 398819 978493 477382 415031 117117 758458 107892 555739 443371 440062 254557 553066 730112 425605 676264 883797 799790 873615 319128 138468 771515 606203 520402 912225 324586 123465 055610 760306 060869 139937 347719 157333 723050 857957 146466 980920 385246 741493 481035 136853 192352 914284 808434 298986 402001 432010 074010 381485 471866 457573 191298 365890 418747 710097 010782 865395 291428 813275 946013 346853 113120 133379 666867 399587 145396 758952 130568 006286 623755 695718 027165 628400 857587 013025 335752 846034 241112 752827 238081 715324 662449 710103 592414 379882 567482 801857 927794 954220 575853 381286 945663 833563 322660 589251 718915 422528 382510 896489 535969 682166 029049 807317 111591 240550 977368 895868 408511 892516 928521 379298 198299 142126 027987 062023 493463 228037 219545 125266 840135 526329 428856 318404 504726 099793 885704 146851 502151 607653 170124 623890 845587 597755 469118 098695 796426 742406 293831 965670 583884 037964 926962 579397 745786 436749 051248 969466 122370 706930 810279 250465 352093 719608 243817 311951 499076 675210 320226 630725 137423 119470 743215 010230 311717 023487 660148 781725 678050 467546 619148 834226 347267 275588 248612 448693 066350 810501 494722 915354 343438 156670 828935 542652 553518 680605 696454 711646 026961 941176 674554 884959 879380 229922 760703 854947 365621 276622 840093 956255 630348 829878 265857 713790 034957 741971 315471 100817 900412 980047 978268 5697
c = 22017
```

I can now create an ASN.1 file that encapsulates all this information

```
asn1=SEQUENCE:rsa_key

[rsa_key]
version=INTEGER:0
modulus=INTEGER:
pubExp=INTEGER:65537
privExp=INTEGER:
p=INTEGER:53549
q=INTEGER:
e1=INTEGER:31627
e2=INTEGER:
coeff=INTEGER:22017
```

And use `openssl` to create a PEM file from this ASN.1 spec

```bash
$ openssl asn1parse -genconf priv.asn1 -out private.der
$ openssl rsa -in private.der -inform der -out private.pem -outform pem
```

I can then confirm I've done everything correctly by verifiying the public cert corresponding to my new private key, matches the one I started with

```bash
$ openssl rsa -in private.pem -pubout > verify_public.pem
$ diff --strip-trailing-cr -q public.pem verify_public.pem && echo Files match
Files match
```

Great! It worked! Let's see if it decrypts now (notice we need to change the hex text file into actual bytes first, I did so with the `xxd` command)

```bash
$ xxd -r -p 8208.txt enc.bin
$ openssl rsautl -decrypt -in enc.bin -out plaintext.txt -inkey private.pem
```

Checking `plaintext.txt`... it does! We have our flag.

```
StormCTF{Crypto2:ead4f1Bd80cfa1df2de14ABbC28d5c0e}
```
